content.description:
•  Only accepts .mp3, .wav files, maximum 1MB. 
•  Use memorable names for sound effects. 
•  Sound effects will be used in clan notifications or events.

toast.errorFileType: Invalid file type. Only .mp3, .mpeg and .wav files are allowed.

main.fileRequirements: Only accepts .mp3, .wav files, maximum 1MB. Use memorable names for voice stickers. Voice stickers will be used in clan notifications or events.
main.personalizeDescription: Personalize voice stickers for your clan!
main.noSoundEffects: No voice stickers yet. Click "Upload voice sticker" to add!
